timeline.message:
KOGITO-779: BPMN Kogito webapp optimization
* Use production settings for generated artifact
* Reduce the artifact's assembled size (by changes on the dependency scopes)
* Readme updates

timeline.bodyText: @mbiarnes could you please clarify, do we need to modify this in some PR job definitions?
timeline.author: domhanak

replies.bodyText:
hey @domhanak - this is just for skipping that module on productized builds, maybe it's not a mandatory thing but it's saving some build time, so IMO it does not hurt. I don't either think this is related to any PR job.. it's just each module owner who should decide what to expose.
This is also being done in DMN, see https://github.com/kiegroup/kie-wb-common/blob/master/kie-wb-common-dmn/kie-wb-common-dmn-webapp-kogito-runtime/pom.xml#L558 ( CC @manstis )
Does that makes sense guys?
replies.author: romartin

replies.bodyText: Yes, makes sense, I just wanted to confirm we do not skip this on PR checks.
replies.author: domhanak

replies.bodyText: Because for our repo it makes sense to have this built too.
replies.author: domhanak

timeline.message: KOGITO-779: BPMN Kogito webapp - Disable maven enforcer plugin for Eclipse EMF stuff (BPMN client side marshallers)

timeline.author: hasys
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -53,20 +53,16 @@
   <!-- BPMN -->
   <inherits name="org.kie.workbench.common.stunner.bpmn.StunnerBpmnClient"/>
   <inherits name="org.kie.workbench.common.stunner.bpmn.StunnerBpmnMarshalling"/>
-  
-  <extend-property name="locale" values="es"/>
-  <extend-property name="locale" values="fr"/>
-  <extend-property name="locale" values="ja"/>
-  <extend-property name="locale" values="pt_BR"/>
-  <extend-property name="locale" values="zh_CN"/>
-  <extend-property name="locale" values="de"/>
+
+  <!-- Only default locale support for kogito. -->
+  <set-property name="locale" value="default"/>
 
   <!-- Configure Errai to return default values for missing i18n keys -->
   <set-property name="errai.i18n.default_per_key" value="true"/>
 
   <!-- We don't need to support IE10 or older -->
   <!-- There is no "ie11" permutation. IE11 uses the Firefox one (gecko1_8) -->
-  <set-property name="user.agent" value="gecko1_8,safari"/>
+  <set-property name="user.agent" value="safari"/>

replies.bodyText: yeah I also noticed the kogito webapp for DMN removed that agent support, but I asked @manstis @porcelli @ederign and it looks we're fine yep. So just following same directions.
replies.author: romartin
